question: Which energy conversion takes place when a battery-operated toy car is switched on and moves?

options: Energy can be created but not destroyed
Energy can be destroyed but not created
Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only converted from one form to another

answer: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only converted from one form to another
